post.summary: Create or update a document module
post.description: Creates a new document module or updates an existing one.

DocumentID.description: The ID of the document being updated (optional for creating a new document).

DocumentOwner.description: The name of the document owner.

Checker.description: An array of user UUIDs assigned as checkers for the document.

EscalationPerson.description: An array of user UUIDs assigned for escalation.

EscalationAfter.description: Number of hours after which escalation should occur.

file.description: (PDF) Mandatory to upload related to the document.

post.description: Publish document module and adjusts its master version.

ContentID.description: Unique ID of the parent element of the document

message.example: DocumentID or ContentID or ModuleTypeId does not exist

post.summary: Create or update a Skill Building module
post.description: Creates a new Skill Building module or updates an existing one.

TrainingSimulationID.description: The ID of the Skill Building being updated (optional for creating a new Skill Building).

TrainingSimulationName.description: The name of the Skill Building.

TrainingSimulationDescription.description: The description of the Skill Building.
TrainingSimulationDescription.example: This is a test Skill Building.

TrainingSimulationIsActive.description: Whether the Skill Building is active.

TrainingSimulationTags.description: Comma-separated tags for the Skill Building.

TrainingSimulationOwner.description: The name of the Skill Building owner.

Checker.description: An array of user UUIDs assigned as checkers for the document.

EscalationPerson.description: An array of user UUIDs assigned for escalation.

EscalationAfter.description: Number of hours after which escalation should occur.

file.description: (ZIP) Mandatory to upload related to the document.

post.description: Publish Skill Building module and adjusts its master version.

ModuleTypeID.description: Unique ID of the Skill Building

TrainingSimulationID.description: Unique ID of the Skill Building

ContentID.description: Unique ID of the parent element of the Skill Building

message.example: Skill Building Module Status updated successfully
DocumentID or ContentID or ModuleTypeId does not exist

post.summary: Create or update a Skill Assessment module
post.description: Creates a new Skill Assessment module or updates an existing one.

TestSimulationID.description: The ID of the Skill Assessment being updated (optional for creating a new Skill Assessment).

TestSimulationName.description: The name of the Skill Assessment.

TestSimulationDescription.description: The description of the Skill Assessment.
TestSimulationDescription.example: This is a test Skill Assessment.

TestSimulationIsActive.description: Whether the Skill Assessment is active.

TestSimulationTags.description: Comma-separated tags for the Skill Assessment.

TestSimulationOwner.description: The name of the Skill Assessment owner.

Checker.description: An array of user UUIDs assigned as checkers for the document.

EscalationPerson.description: An array of user UUIDs assigned for escalation.

EscalationAfter.description: Number of hours after which escalation should occur.

TotalAttempts.description: Number of attempts of Skill Assessment.

file.description: (ZIP) Mandatory to upload related to the document.

post.description: Publish Skill Assessment module and adjusts its master version.

TestSimulationID.description: Unique ID of the Skill Assessment

ContentID.description: Unique ID of the parent element of the document

message.example: Skill Assessment Module Status updated successfully
DocumentID or ContentID or ModuleTypeId does not exist

post.summary: Create or update a SOP module
post.description: Creates a new SOP module or updates an existing one.

SOPID.description: The ID of the SOP being updated (optional for creating a new SOP).

SOPOwner.description: The name of the SOP owner.

Checker.description: An array of user UUIDs assigned as checkers for the document.

EscalationPerson.description: An array of user UUIDs assigned for escalation.

EscalationAfter.description: Number of hours after which escalation should occur.

post.description: Publish SOP module and adjusts its master version.

ContentID.description: Unique ID of the parent element of the document

message.example: SOPID or ContentID or ModuleTypeId does not exist
